item.title: Artificial Ephemerality
item.description: Artificial Ephemerality Generative Art | 2018, Academic Work -- - Press "S" to save the current screenshot to your desktop. - Press "T" to turn on/off the music. - Press "P" to pause the generation process. Phase: Concept, Design, Build Period: 08/2018 (1 Week) Team: Sole Project Role: Maker, Coder What I did: Define Experience Concept Method: Moodboard, Research, Iterative coding Technology: processing, p5.

item.title: IBM JAPAN DESIGNER'S BOARD
item.description: IBM JAPAN DESIGNER'S BOARD Graphic Design | 2016, Professional Work WHY I DID: How do we IBM designers communicate our new design culture to external clients? Phase: Concept, Develop, Deliver Period: 12/2015 - 01/2016 Team: Sole Project Role: Graphic Designer What I did: Define Experience Concept Method: IBM Design Thinking Output: Profile Board Product Golive: 01/2016 - until now WHAT I DID: Designed profile boards to show our talents in theIBM Tokyo Studio HOW I DID: Starting point was a respect to the traditional IBM design philosophy.
